Detailed Description

A utility class to compute mean, variance of a streaming set of inputs.

void edu.ou.asgbook.core.ScalarStatistic.update ( ScalarStatistic  other  )  

00047                                              {
00048         sumx += other.sumx;
00049         sumx2 += other.sumx2;
00050         if ( N == 0 ){
00051             min = other.min;
00052             max = other.max;
00053         } else if (other.N != 0){
00054             min = Math.min(min, other.min);
00055             max = Math.max(max, other.max);
00056         }
00057         N += other.N;
00058     }

void edu.ou.asgbook.core.ScalarStatistic.update ( double  x,
int  relwt 
) 

00035                                            {
00036         sumx += (x*relwt);
00037         sumx2 += (x*x*relwt);
00038         if ( N == 0 ){
00039             min = max = x;
00040         } else {
00041             min = Math.min(min, x);
00042             max = Math.max(max, x);
00043         }
00044         N += relwt;
00045     }
